Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: indeed1917
Reviews.Content: Great package, great lens!  Nice lens bag!  The lens takes very sharp close ups!  Fun to use!  Highly recommended!  If you want this lens, get this package deal!  Shipped nicely.

Reviews.Title: Does the work it meant for
Reviews.Author: Abhaya
Reviews.Content: Sorry for late feedback , as I was not getting time to fully use it. This lens is really great built and takes the photo crisps and clear. Good zoom options , image stability is excellent , I shoot the video while driving on rough road and captured many birds properly. Tried with High ISO for taking full moon and I could capture all black spots of the moon very well.Did not give 5 star to it because of one reason the bulky feature on a very light small camera NEX5n . The lens obscure the flash , so you need a flash mount if you want to avoid the lens coming in way.So overall a good lens for long zoom and also macro shooting , portrait also came good.

ProductInfo.Features:
Sony Alpha SEL18200 E-mount 18-200mm F3.5-6.3 OSS Lens for NEX Cameras
16 Gigabyte SD Secure Digital Memory Card
Sony NP-FW50 Lithium Ion Battery Pack
Lens Carrying Pouch with Drawstring
Lens Pen Cleaning Tool
